scripts.android:stage: mkdir -p android/app/src/stage && cp android/app/google-services-stage.json android/app/src/stage/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.staging react-native run-android --mode=stageDebug --appIdSuffix stage
scripts.android:dev: mkdir -p android/app/src/dev && cp android/app/google-services-dev.json android/app/src/dev/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-android --mode=devDebug
scripts.android:prod: mkdir -p android/app/src/prod && cp android/app/google-services-prod.json android/app/src/prod/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.production react-native run-android --mode=prodRelease
scripts.build-apk:prod: mkdir -p android/app/src/prod && cp android/app/google-services-prod.json android/app/src/prod/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./gradlew assembleProdRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-apk:stage: mkdir -p android/app/src/stage && cp android/app/google-services-stage.json android/app/src/stage/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew assembleStageReleaseStaging && cd ..
scripts.build-apk:dev: mkdir -p android/app/src/dev && cp android/app/google-services-dev.json android/app/src/dev/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.development ./gradlew assembleDevReleaseDevelopment && cd ..
scripts.build-aab:dev: cp android/app/google-services-dev.json android/app/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.development ./gradlew bundleDevReleaseDevelopment && cd ..
scripts.build-aab:stage: cp android/app/google-services-stage.json android/app/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew bundleStageReleaseStaging && cd ..
scripts.build-aab:prod: cp android/app/google-services-prod.json android/app/google-services.json && cd android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && cd ..
scripts.ios:se: cp -f .env.development .env 2>/dev/null || true && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios --simulator="iPhone SE (3rd generation)"
scripts.ios: cp -f .env.development .env 2>/dev/null || true && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios --scheme RewardedDevelopment --simulator="iPhone 16 Pro"
scripts.ios:stage: cp -f .env.staging .env 2>/dev/null || true && ENVFILE=.env.staging react-native run-ios --scheme RewardedStaging --simulator="iPhone 16 Pro"
scripts.ios:prod: cp -f .env.production .env 2>/dev/null || true && ENVFILE=.env.production react-native run-ios --simulator="iPhone 16 Pro"
scripts.lint: yarn lint:rules && yarn lint:code-format && yarn lint:type-check
scripts.lint:fix: yarn lint:rules --fix && yarn lint:code-format --write && yarn lint:type-check
scripts.bugsnag:upload: bugsnag-cli upload android-ndk android/ && bugsnag-cli upload android-proguard android/ && bugsnag-cli upload react-native-android && bugsnag-cli upload dsym ios/ && bugsnag-cli upload react-native-ios
